text:
Hey, lovely people,

We're excited to share with you what we’ve been up to lately!

We created a new free HubSpot theme - Lunar - designed to help HubSpot users develop engaging landing pages and/or websites.

We've put a lot of thought into this, but we want to make sure that we're on the right track, so we'd love to get your feedback.

We’d be grateful if you could give us feedback on the design and usability of the theme and on any features or elements that you like or dislike.

It would be great if you could also share ideas for how we can make the theme even better.

You can find it here: <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/4068402/marketplace/website/lunar-theme-by-stoica>

Thaanks!
